chunk:
Beauty by Earth, Facial Scrub-Superfruits & Calendula

Brand: Beauty by Earth

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Organic Aloe (Vera) Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Lauryl Glucoside, Decyl Glucoside, Bambusa Arundinacea (Bamboo Powder) Stem Extract, Pumice (Volcanic), Organic Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Extract, Organic Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Organic Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Extract, Organic Chamomilla Recutita

(Volcanic), Organic Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Extract, Organic Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Organic Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Extract, Organic Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Organic Camellia Oleifera (Japanese Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Organic Juglans Regia (Walnut) Seed Extract, Radish Root

Flower Extract, Organic Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Organic Camellia Oleifera (Japanese Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Organic Juglans Regia (Walnut) Seed Extract, Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Xanthan Gum, Glycerin (Vegetable), Citrus Sinensis (Sweet Orange) Essential Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Essential Oil, Tocopherol

Regia (Walnut) Seed Extract, Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Xanthan Gum, Glycerin (Vegetable), Citrus Sinensis (Sweet Orange) Essential Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Essential Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Chlorophyll
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
